name: Duval
text: Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) On Play Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

effect.text: After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.
Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.
